programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Giroud's career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. programme.desc: Action from the Sprint Race at the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Austria at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg. Francesco Bagnaia was triumphant in this race last year.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Austria. Can Marc Marquez end his nine-year wait for a win at the Red Bull Ring?

programme.title: MotoGP Chequered Flag
programme.desc: Post-race show featuring analysis, highlights and interviews with all the key riders following the 2025 Grand Prix of Austria at the Red Bull Ring.

programme.title: Golden Trail World Series
programme.desc: Action from the Golden Trail World Series in Sierre Zinal in Switzerland. This is the oldest race of its kind in Europe.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Adelaide Crows play Collingwood at Adelaide Oval. The Crows could secure a double chance with a win over the stumbling Magpies.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as North Melbourne face Richmond at Ninja Stadium. The Roos won 78-74 when these sides last faced off in round 10.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Sydney Swans go head-to-head with Geelong Cats at the SCG. The Cats are looking to bag a fifth win in a row.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Western Bulldogs play West Coast Eagles at Marvel Stadium. The Eagles are still searching for their second win of the season.

programme.title: Hard Knocks
programme.desc: Mitchell Trubisky and Mike White continue their tussle to be back-up quarterback to Josh Allen. And, head coach Sean McDermott opens up about his battle with skin cancer.

programme.title: The Ultimate Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Action from UFC 319 at United Center in Chicago, featuring the main event showdown between middleweight champion Dricus du Plessis and undefeated contender Khamzat Chimaev.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded
programme.desc: A look back at UFC Fight Night in Auckland from June 2014, featuring the enthralling headline middleweight bout between Nate Marquardt and James Te Huna.

programme.title: TNT Sports Films
programme.desc: What does the future hold for rugby in the battle against global warming? Reshmin Chowdhury meets people at all levels to discuss how rugby can be a positive force for change.

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: Action from the Women's National Basketball Association as Las Vegas Aces host Dallas Wings at Michelob ULTRA Arena.

programme.title: Australia Championship Supercars
programme.desc: Highlights from the Supercars Championship and day one of the 2025 Century Batteries Ipswich Super 440 at Queensland Raceway.

programme.title: Australia Championship Supercars
programme.desc: Highlights from the Supercars Championship and day two of the 2025 Century Batteries Ipswich Super 440 at Queensland Raceway.

programme.title: FIA European Rally Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the Rally Czech, part of the 2025 European Rally Championship.

programme.title: Ultra-Trail World Series
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 Eiger Ultra Trail, part of the UTMB World Series. This course presents the competitors with a mighty challenge and a truly spectacular alpine experience.

programme.title: NWSL
programme.desc: Action from the National Women's Soccer League as Washington Spirit face Racing Louisville FC at Audi Field. The Spirit were 2-0 winners when these sides met in April.

programme.title: NWSL
programme.desc: Action from the National Women's Soccer League as league leaders Kansas City Current take on Seb Hines' Orlando Pride at CPKC Stadium.

programme.title: Inside Serie A
programme.desc: We preview the 2025/26 Serie A season, as Antonio Conte looks to lead Napoli to another Scudetto. And, there are new eras at Chivu's Inter, Tudor's Juventus and Allegri's Milan.

programme.title: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Highlights from Major League Baseball.

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: Action from the Women's National Basketball Association as Las Vegas Aces host Dallas Wings at Michelob ULTRA Arena.

programme.title: Onboard
programme.desc: A special onboard look at the Ocean Race, a yacht race around the world.

programme.title: Fishing: On the Bank
programme.desc: Hughesy heads up to the River Trent in search of carp and barbel, We look at sediment issues in River Keepers Diary, and the lads go head to head in a floater v fly challenge.

programme.title: FIA European Rally Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the Rally Czech, part of the 2025 European Rally Championship.

programme.title: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Highlights from Major League Baseball.

programme.title: Live: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Major League Baseball action as Detroit Tigers go head-to-head with Houston Astros.

programme.title: MLB Plays of the Week
programme.desc: This weekly MLB highlights show showcases the most exciting plays from the past week's matches.

programme.title: The Gruppetto
programme.desc: Hosted by Rob Hatch, The Gruppetto brings you everything you need to stay up to speed with the world of cycling, from in-depth race reviews to the latest news from the peloton.

programme.title: Discovery Golf
programme.desc: A weekly show featuring the latest news from the world of golf.

programme.title: The Ultimate Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Action from UFC 319 at United Center in Chicago, featuring the main event showdown between middleweight champion Dricus du Plessis and undefeated contender Khamzat Chimaev.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: After his incarceration, a former boxer learns that his wife has passed away, leaving behind a sick daughter. To get her to undergo treatment, he agrees to step into the ring again.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: New Hong Kong immigrants Yuan and her sister face identity crises, poverty and their father's drug addiction. Even as they separate from their father, Yuan finds his traits mirrored in her loved ones.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau 3
programme.desc: The latest sequel to the action-comedy FROM VEGAS to MACAU brings Andy Lau & Jacky Cheung back in a power-packed new tale.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: The first Bollywood movie made in Hong Kong, it is about an interracial love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy! Faced with many difficulties, can their love prevail?

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A fortune teller predicts that Tung will be imprisoned for murder, he tries to change his fate but a veteran detective believes Tung to be a psychopathic serial killer & pursues him relentlessly.

programme.title: Love for All Seasons
programme.desc: Womanizer Tiger Hung arrives in Mount Emei to get the cure of his illness. May is the only woman who is capable to do so, but Tiger has to break her heart first before she gains the healing power.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learned boxing since young & uses his skills to help the weak. When his friend is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: When Emperor Zheng De fled the palace to avoid an unwanted marriage, he never expected to lose his money & his advisors. Fortunately, the kind inn owner, Phoenix, takes him in out of pity.

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: A washed-up stunt director is struggling to find his way in the changing film industry. He risks everything to make a comeback, while striving to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: Adapted from a TV series, the movie follows Huang as she mourns for her boyfriend's death and receives a mysterious cassette player to travel back in time. Will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Disgraced by a lady fighter named Chun, the Grandmaster Fei Lung's unexpected romantic feelings towards her threatens to derail his win in the final fight he has challenged her to.

programme.title: Old Fox
programme.desc: Liao Jie and his father save to buy a home but are too poor. Liao Jie learns survival skills from their landlord Old Fox and ends up hurting him, but his empathy stops him from becoming like Old Fox.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit plots a major heist which is joined by two dispirited men inadvertently. Their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery lands them in a fierce police pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over her young son's death by becoming a foster parent. Her dedication to the children leads her to neglect her husband. Will the couple be able to salvage their relationship?

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Customs officers uncover illegal weapons on a cargo ship linked to an international conflict. Elite agents go undercover and reveal a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel features the plight of Hong Kong's grassroots performing artists fighting against the government's plan to gentrify an industrial district where they lived.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Marking the 3rd Eileen Chang adaptation directed by Ann Hui, this film is set in pre-WW2 Hong Kong, where a young girl ends up working for her aunt seducing rich & powerful men.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescues the six major sects & the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues. After several vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the 2 legendary weapons.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: Two elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Inexternal
programme.desc: Ming falls into coma and is transported to a fantasy realm where old Master Turtle teaches him ancient boxing skill to defeat an evil boss. Meanwhile, Ming's mother finds a way to save her son.

programme.title: Love Is The Only Answer
programme.desc: When a flash of her groom's infidelity is revealed at their wedding, Bo cancels the entire affair. However, within a year, he comes knocking on her door again.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: Winner of 8 HKFA awards & featuring an all-star cast, this film depicts an elite team guarding Dr Sun Yat Sen in Hong Kong, as he discusses plans to overthrow the Qing dynasty.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer reunites with her estranged guitarist father, and along with other family members, they unite to support each other through their love for music.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Five bounty hunters are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings plaguing a hotel group in Bangkok. Can they solve the crime and finally collect the bounty?

programme.desc: The Wombats organize the Treeborhood Talent Show. Malik and Zeke create their own Brother Day. Zadie makes noise with her Really Big, Really Loud Noisy Thing. Dream Home is set to take the renovation genre to new heights as six pairs of everyday Aussies battle it out room by room, transforming tired suburban family homes into astonishing new dream homes.

She was the last pharaoh of Egypt and one of the most famous queens of all time, but her death in 31 B.C. has been shrouded in mystery. Cleopatra's body and final resting place have been lost without a trace for over 2,000 years, leaving the world's top archaeologists baffled. Can new evidence finally uncover Cleopatra's missing tomb?
Breakthrough: Women Changing the Game follows a diverse group of female athletes through make-or-break seasons in traditionally male-dominated sports.

Robbie Cumming offers a personal take on life aboard his narrowboat home the Naughty Lass. The waterways explorer discovers the landscapes, towns and villages of the Midlands. He sets out on a challenging journey through summer, autumn and winter 2023/24 which takes him from Braunston, Northamptonshire through Birminghams maze of canals before heading south along the Grand Union Canal.

Season 3 of Australias real-life extreme version of hide and seek returns with an intense twist in the form of a large-scale heist. Nine pairs of ordinary Australians turn into shrewd Fugitives, starting with a robbery thatll see them stealth their way into Ballarat bank to steal up to $1 million dollars, before making their getaway to disappear without a trace. The goal is to make it to the e

All over the world, there are giant monoliths that our ancient ancestors carved out of solid rock. But what was the purpose of these huge stone monuments? Did they serve some kind of ritual function? Were they intended to honor the gods? Or is it possible that, as some believe, certain monoliths were actually designed to conduct energy?

ABC News' acclaimed series '20/20' has distinguished itself as one of the most esteemed news programs in broadcast journalism. Amid the heated, competitive environment of primetime entertainment, '20/20' has demonstrated its ability to consistently attract a significant segment of the viewing audience by offering viewers more choices and more chances to learn about the world around them.

Infinity: What on Earth Are We Thinking? is a new entertaining, high-quality feature documentary film series, exploring one of the most significant unanswered questions of our time Does infinity exist?.
